subject: The Internet Patrol -  Fake eBay Customer Notice is Really a Forged Phishing Attempt - See Pictures Here!
body:
The Internet Patrol


 The Internet Patrol
http://www.theinternetpatrol.com

Fake eBay Customer Notice is Really a Forged Phishing Attempt - See Pictures Here!

Lots of people are receiving a purported "customer notice" from eBay.  It starts out "Please note that this is a system generated email." And goes on to state that "eBay has sent you this message to remind you its time to update your account details. To ensure your account continues to function normally it is recommended you update your details."  It looks very real, but it's actually a phish originating from Moldova. 

Read more here: Fake eBay Customer Notice is Really a Forged Phishing Attempt - See Pictures Here! 

Please visit http://www.TheSiteForTheCure.com !  Pretty please??
